title: Zuckerberg tells Congress 'I'm sorry' for data misuse
text:
Zuckerberg tells Congress 'I'm sorry' for data misuse Tuesday, April 10, 2018 - 01:17 
Facebook Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg apologized to Congress on Tuesday, telling members he was sorry for not doing enough to prevent the tools of Facebook from being used for harm. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
Facebook Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg apologized to Congress on Tuesday, telling members he was sorry for not doing enough to prevent the tools of Facebook from being used for harm. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2qolwBR
